title: Build a Shared Library of Custom Transformers

questions.question: Can you nest custom transformers? That is, can you put one custom transformer inside another?
options: Yes, but you can only nest transformers of the same type (Linked or Embedded).
Yes, but you cannot nest Linked Custom Transformers.
Yes, but only a single level of nesting.

questions.question: If you wish to create a custom transformer that defines an organization-wide process that should be conducted the same way in all workspaces, which transformer type should you choose?
If you want to create a custom transformer for a very specific process you think will only ever be needed in your workspace, which transformer type should you choose?
Linked custom transformers are stored in FMX files separate from FMW workspace files.
You add a linked custom transformer to your workspace, then change it to embedded. You make changes to it. Can you now revert it to a linked transformer?
